
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_53065081">
<font color="#111111"><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot"><font size="5">课程将初中几何高频考点归纳为76种解题模型，</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#111111"><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot"><font size="5">涵盖全等三角形(如“边角边”“角边角”判定应用)、</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#111111"><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot"><font size="5">相似三角形(比例关系与实际问题结合)、中点模型(中位线性质)、</font></font></font><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><br>
<font color="#111111"><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot"><font size="5">线段最值(如“将军饮马”问题)等核心模块，</font></font></font><font style="color:rgb(17, 17, 17)"><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot"><font size="5">匹配中考命题趋势设计，进行针对性训练。</font></font></font><br>
<font style="color:rgb(17, 17, 17)"><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot"><font size="5"><br>
